Text: Manfish:  Filmed in Jamaica, it was released in Great Britain as "Calypso".

Text: Manfish:  The leading female star was Tessa Prendergast, who played Alita.

<Text: Manfish:  Tessa later became a fashion designer and designed the white bikini of Ursula Andress for "Dr. No".>

Text: Manfish:  The film also featured the motion picture debut of Barbara Nichols.
